long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly scroll through web pages with Page Surfer

Page Surfer enhances your browsing experience by allowing you to automatically scroll through web pages at your desired speed. With the click of a button, you can start, stop, and adjust the scrolling speed with ease. Say goodbye to manually scrolling through long articles or social media feeds and let Page Surfer do the work for you.

How to use:
 • Install the extension and visit any web page to start using Page Surfer.
 • Click on the Page Surfer icon in your browser to open the extension window.
 • Use the start and stop buttons to control the scrolling, and use the tortoise and     hare buttons to adjust the scrolling speed.
 • Sit back and enjoy effortless scrolling through your favorite web pages.

With Page Surfer, you can save time and improve your browsing experience. Try it out today!
